name: Easter Hunt (Nespumoso, Gamba04, R_to_Restart)
description:
Throw eggs at the targets to win this google cardboard game! But be careful, if you use all your eggs without hitting many, you'll be the loser.

Different bunnies count for different amounts of points, so try not to be greedy and be careful when aiming.

Controls: touch the screen or use google cardboard's button to grab an egg and use it again while having an eg in hand to throw it.

DEVELOPERS

  • Gamba04
  • R_to_Restart
  • Nespumoso
